comment._content:
Blanche Estabrook. Karl died in 1921 and she remarried in 1923, to Colonel Arthur O'Brien, Assistant Secretary of War under Newton D. Baker.

NYT July 26 1902
Karl G. Roebling to Marry
Trenton, N. J., July 25

The engagement was announced to-night of Miss Blanche Estabrook of Chicago, daughter of Henry Estabrook, general solicitor of the Western Union Telegraph Company, and a niece of Col. Robert C. Clowry, President of the same company, to Karl G. Roebling of this city. Mr. Roebling is a son of Ferdinand W. Roebling and a Director of the John A. Roebling Sons Company. He was graduated from Princeton in the class of 1894.
